Open-Source Software Solutions for Development Teams

Who we are

Developer's Workspace develops open-source software solutions to allow development teams to never build the usual/common features of a software project again.

Survey

Authentication

An API that provides developers with a foundation for implementing identity and user management.

An API that provides developers with a foundation for implementing messaging ( Internal, Email, Slack )

Our Latest Work

World of Rations

  • Client: Savas Couvaras
  • What we did: UI/UX, Database, Web Development

World of Rations is an online cloud-based ration formulation program, structured in such a way as to suit the farmer, specialist nutritionist, feed milling companies and academics alike. The program formulates rations in a true least-cost linear programming procedure...
